content.text:
# Satellite Award for Best Cinematography__disambig_1

| awarded_for = Best Cinematography
| presenter   = International Press Academy
| country     = United States
| year        = 1996
| holder      = Greig Fraser – Dune: Part Two (2024)
| website     =
}}
The Satellite Award for Best Cinematography is one of the annual Satellite Awards given by the International Press Academy.
